1468930.name: RPG Maker MZ - Time Fantasy: Farm and Fort
1468930.description:
A graphics expansion with fresh tilesets and icons in the crisp pixels of the Time Fantasy style! Expand your world with all the essentials for farms and forts-- loot, weapons, crops, and more! Complete your collection with over 300 icons!

Create farms with new tiles for houses and barns, and a variety of crops will bring them to life with multiple stages of growth. Build forts with spiked fences, tents and huts. Defenses and cages can build a soldier's encampment or even an orcish village! Expand on your world's locations with much-requested graphics for jail cells and tent interiors. This pack also includes 335 ICONS in the Time Fantasy style-- icons for skills, items, weapons, equipment, loot, UI elements and more!

Features:

  • Retro pixel art to match all Time Fantasy graphics.
  • 5 new tilesets!
  • A wide variety of grops with images for different stages of growth.
  • Iconset with 335 icons -- skills, items, equipment, loot and more!
  • For use with RPG Maker MV or the engine of your choice

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1468930.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
